languages.text:
The wearer gains the following:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Uses Agility instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Toughness instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and Strength instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenerates {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per turn.</indent>
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, any damage they deal is increased by +1% until the end of combat, while their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship are reduced by −1 (no less than 1) until the end of combat.

-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
装备者获得以下效果：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高25点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}检定时，使用敏捷进行检定；进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}检定时，使用坚韧进行检定；进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}检定时，使用力量进行检定。</indent>
- <indent=5%>免疫所有{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>每回合恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d}。</indent>
每当装备者杀死敌人时，装备者造成的伤害都会提高1%，但装备者的智力、意志与社交会降低1点（最低降至1点），效果都持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the following:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Uses Agility instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Toughness instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and Strength instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenerates {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per turn.</indent>
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, any damage they deal is increased by +1% until the end of combat, while their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship are reduced by −1 (no less than 1) until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 装备者获得以下效果： - {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高25点。 - 进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}检定时，使用敏捷进行检定；进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}检定时，使用坚韧进行检定；进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}检定时，使用力量进行检定。 - 免疫所有{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。 - 每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于（坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）。 每当装备者杀死敌人时，装备者造成的伤害都会永久提高1%，但装备者的智力、意志与社交永久降低1点（最低降至1点）。 ！此物品一旦装备便无法移除。

装备者获得以下效果：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高25点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}检定时，使用敏捷进行检定；进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}检定时，使用坚韧进行检定；进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}检定时，使用力量进行检定。</indent>
- <indent=5%>免疫所有{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d}。</indent>
每当装备者杀死敌人时，装备者造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高1%，但装备者的智力、意志与社交会降低1点（最低降至1点），效果都持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
Персонаж получает следующие эффекты:
-<indent=5%>+25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, Ловкости и Восприятию.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Возможность использовать значение Ловкости вместо Интеллекта, Выносливости вместо Воли и Силы вместо Общительности.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранениям{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Восстановление {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за ход.</indent>
Каждый раз, когда персонаж убивает противника, наносимый им урон до конца боя увеличивается на 1%, но Интеллект, Воля и Общительность уменьшаются на 1 (не могут стать меньше 1).
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the following:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Uses Agility instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Toughness instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and Strength instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenerates {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per turn.</indent>
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, any damage they deal is increased by +1% until the end of combat, while their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship are reduced by −1 (no less than 1) until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает следующие эффекты: -+25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} -возможность использовать значение Ловкости вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, Выносливости вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и Силы вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} -иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранениям{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g} -восстановление (бонус ВЫН / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Каждый раз, когда персонаж убивает противника, наносимый им урон бессрочно увеличивается на 1%, но Интеллект, Воля и Общительность уменьшаются на 1 (не могут стать меньше 1). ! Этот предмет нельзя снять.

Персонаж получает следующие эффекты: -+25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} -возможность использовать значение Ловкости вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, Выносливости вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и Силы вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} -иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранениям{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g} -восстановление (бонус ВЫН / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Каждый раз, когда персонаж убивает противника, наносимый им урон бессрочно увеличивается на 1%, но Интеллект, Воля и Общительность уменьшаются на 1 (не могут стать меньше 1). ! Этот предмет нельзя снять.

Персонаж получает следующие эффекты:
-<indent=5%>+25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}, Ловкости и Восприятию.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Возможность использовать значение Ловкости вместо Интеллекта, Выносливости вместо Воли и Силы вместо Общительности.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранениям{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмам{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Восстановление {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за ход.</indent>
Каждый раз, когда персонаж убивает противника, наносимый им урон до конца боя увеличивается на 1%, но Интеллект, Воля и Общительность уменьшаются на 1 (не могут стать меньше 1).

languages.text:
使用者は次の効果を獲得する：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}を+25。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}の代わりに敏捷、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の代わりに耐久力、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}の代わりに腕力を使用する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}への耐性。</indent>
-<indent=5%>ターンごとに{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を{uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d}回復する。</indent>
使用者が敵をキルするたびに、使用者の与ダメージが戦闘終了まで永続的に1%上昇するが、知性、意志力、連帯が戦闘終了まで永続的に−1減少する（1以下にはならない）。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the following:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Uses Agility instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Toughness instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and Strength instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenerates {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per turn.</indent>
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, any damage they deal is increased by +1% until the end of combat, while their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship are reduced by −1 (no less than 1) until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は次を獲得する。 -{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}を25 -{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}の代わりに敏捷、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の代わりに耐久力、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}の代わりに腕力を使用する -{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}傷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}への耐性 -{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}のたびに(TGH{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を再生する 使用者が敵をキルするたびに、使用者の与ダメージが永続的に1%上昇し、一方、知性、意志力、連帯が永続的に1減少する（1以下にはならない）。 ！このアイテムは装備できない。

使用者は次を獲得する：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}</indent>を+25
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}の代わりに敏捷、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の代わりに耐久力、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}</indent>の代わりに腕力を使用する
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}傷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}</indent>への耐性
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}のたびに{uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d}{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を</indent>再生する
使用者が敵をキルするたびに、使用者の与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が戦闘終了まで永続的に１%上昇し、一方、知性、意志力、連帯が戦闘終了まで永続的に−1減少する（1以下にはならない）。

使用者は次の効果を獲得する：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、敏捷、認知力を+25。</indent>
-<indent=5%>知性の代わりに敏捷、意志力の代わりに耐久力、連帯の代わりに腕力を使用する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}への耐性。</indent>
-<indent=5%>ターンごとに{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を{uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d}回復する。</indent>
使用者が敵をキルするたびに、使用者の与ダメージが戦闘終了まで永続的に1%上昇するが、知性、意志力、連帯が戦闘終了まで永続的に−1減少する（1以下にはならない）。

languages.text:
El portador también obtiene lo siguiente:
-<indent=5%>+25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Usa Agilidad en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, Resistencia en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y Fuerza en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenera {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por turno.</indent>
Cada vez que el aliado elimina a un enemigo, cualquier daño que cause aumenta +1 % hasta el final del combate, mientras que su Inteligencia, Voluntad y Empatía disminuyen −1 permanentemente (sin disminuir por debajo de 1) hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the following:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Uses Agility instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Toughness instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and Strength instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenerates {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per turn.</indent>
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, any damage they deal is increased by +1% until the end of combat, while their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship are reduced by −1 (no less than 1) until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: El portador también obtiene lo siguiente: -+25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} -usa Agilidad en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, Resistencia en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y Fuerza en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} -inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g} -regenera ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por RES / 2) de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Cada vez que el aliado elimina a un enemigo, cualquier daño que cause aumenta +1 % permanentemente, mientras que su Inteligencia, Voluntad y Empatía disminuyen −1 permanentemente (sin disminuir por debajo de 1). ! No es posible desequipar este objeto.

El portador también obtiene lo siguiente:
-<indent=5%>+25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Usa Agilidad en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, Resistencia en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y Fuerza en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenera {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.</indent>
Cada vez que el aliado elimina a un enemigo, cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que cause aumenta +1 % hasta el final del combate, mientras que su Inteligencia, Voluntad y Empatía disminuyen −1 permanentemente (sin disminuir por debajo de 1) hasta el final del combate.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Einsatz von Beweglichkeit anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, Zähigkeit anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und Stärke anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regeneration von {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} pro Zug.</indent>
Wenn der Träger einen Feind tötet, wird jeder verursachte Schaden bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +1 % erhöht, während seine Intelligenz, Willenskraft und Gefolgschaft bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1 reduziert werden (nicht weniger als 1).
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the following:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Uses Agility instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Toughness instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and Strength instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenerates {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per turn.</indent>
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, any damage they deal is increased by +1% until the end of combat, while their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship are reduced by −1 (no less than 1) until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält: -+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} -Nutzen von Beweglichkeit anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, Zähigkeit anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und Stärke anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} -Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g} -Regeneration von (ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Immer wenn der Träger einen Feind tötet, wird jeder verursachte Schaden dauerhaft um +1 % erhöht, während seine Intelligenz, Willenskraft und Gefolgschaft dauerhaft um -1 verringert werden (nicht weniger als 1). Dieser Gegenstand kann nicht abgelegt werden!

Der Träger erhält:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Nutzen von Beweglichkeit anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, Zähigkeit anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und Stärke anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regeneration von {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.</indent>
Immer wenn der Träger einen Feind tötet, wird jeder verursachte {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +1 % erhöht, während seine Intelligenz, Willenskraft und Gefolgschaft bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1 verringert werden (nicht weniger als 1).

Der Träger erhält:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Einsatz von Beweglichkeit anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, Zähigkeit anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und Stärke anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regeneration von {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} pro Zug.</indent>
Wenn der Träger einen Feind tötet, wird jeder verursachte Schaden bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +1 % erhöht, während seine Intelligenz, Willenskraft und Gefolgschaft bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1 reduziert werden (nicht weniger als 1).

languages.text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de ce qui suit :
-<indent=5%>+25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Utilise l'Agilité au lieu de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, l'Endurance au lieu de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, et la Force au lieu de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Invulnérabilité aux {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g} et aux {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Régénère {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} par tour.</indent>
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi, les dégâts qu'il lui inflige augmentent de +1 % jusqu'à la fin du combat, tandis que son Intelligence, sa Force mentale et sa Sociabilité baissent de façon permanente de −1 (pas moins de 1) jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the following:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Uses Agility instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Toughness instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and Strength instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenerates {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per turn.</indent>
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, any damage they deal is increased by +1% until the end of combat, while their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship are reduced by −1 (no less than 1) until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de ce qui suit : - +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. - Utilise l'Agilité au lieu de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, la Résistance au lieu de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}, et la Force au lieu de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g}. - Invulnérabilité aux {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g} et aux {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}. - Régénère ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de RES / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi, les dégâts qu'il lui inflige augmentent de +1 % de façon permanente, tandis que son Intelligence, sa Volonté et sa Fraternité baissent de façon permanente de -1 (pas moins de 1). ! Cet élément ne peut pas être retiré de l'équipement.

L'utilisateur bénéficie de ce qui suit :
-<indent=5%>+25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, d'Agilité et de Perception.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Utilise l'Agilité au lieu de l'Intelligence, l'Endurance au lieu de la Force mentale, et la Force au lieu de la Sociabilité.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Invulnérabilité aux {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g} et aux {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Régénère {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} par tour.</indent>
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi, les dégâts qu'il lui inflige augmentent de +1 % jusqu'à la fin du combat, tandis que son Intelligence, sa Force mentale et sa Sociabilité baissent de façon permanente de −1 (pas moins de 1) jusqu'à la fin du combat.

L'utilisateur bénéficie de ce qui suit :
-<indent=5%>+25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Utilise l'Agilité au lieu de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, l'Endurance au lieu de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}, et la Force au lieu de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Invulnérabilité aux {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g} et aux {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Régénère {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.</indent>
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'il lui inflige augmentent de +1 % jusqu'à la fin du combat, tandis que son Intelligence, sa Force Mentale et sa Sociabilité baissent de façon permanente de −1 (pas moins de 1) jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text:
Takan kişi şunları kazanır:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} yerine Çeviklik, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} yerine Dayanıklılık ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} yerine Kuvvet kullanır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Sakatlık{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travmalara{/g} karşı bağışıklık.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Her turda {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanı{/g} tazeler.</indent>
Takan kişi, bir düşmanı öldürdükten sonra verdiği her türlü hasar +%1 artarken Zekâ, İrade ve Sosyallik nitelikleri 1'er puan (1'den az olamazlar) azalır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains the following:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Uses Agility instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Toughness instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and Strength instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Regenerates {uip|Regen|e4bcfd3d13f04f8a90ba386210819c7d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per turn.</indent>
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, any damage they deal is increased by +1% until the end of combat, while their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship are reduced by −1 (no less than 1) until the end of combat.

-<indent=5%>Zekâ yerine Çeviklik, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} yerine Dayanıklılık ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} yerine Kuvvet kullanır.</indent>
